name: zshrc-manager
title: Zshrc Manager
description: View and manage your ~/.zshrc from Raycast
author: TurboCoder13

commands.name: index
commands.title: Zshrc Manager
commands.description: View and manage your ~/.zshrc configuration (use dropdown to switch views)

preferences.name: enableCustomHeaderPattern
preferences.label: Enable Custom Header Pattern
preferences.title: Enable Custom Header Pattern
preferences.description: Use a custom regex pattern for section headers

preferences.name: customHeaderPattern
preferences.title: Custom Header Pattern
preferences.description: Regex pattern for section headers (must include one capture group for section name)

preferences.name: enableCustomStartEndPatterns
preferences.label: Enable Custom Start/End Patterns
preferences.title: Enable Custom Start/End Patterns
preferences.description: Use custom regex patterns for section start/end markers

preferences.name: customStartPattern
preferences.title: Custom Start Pattern
preferences.description: Regex pattern for section start markers (must include one capture group for section name)

preferences.name: customEndPattern
preferences.title: Custom End Pattern
preferences.description: Regex pattern for section end markers

preferences.name: enableCustomZshrcPath
preferences.label: Use Custom Zshrc Path
preferences.title: Use Custom Zshrc Path
preferences.description: Specify a custom location for your zshrc file

preferences.name: customZshrcPath
preferences.title: Custom Zshrc Path
preferences.description: Full path to your zshrc file (e.g., /Users/username/.config/zshrc)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:coverage
